g4p.tool.gui

Class GuiControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • g4p.tool.gui.GuiControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TDataConstants, TFileConstants

    public class GuiControl
extends Object
implements TFileConstants, TDataConstants
    Provides main functionality for using the tool. Includes code generation functionality and event handling code capture.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
